title: Angle Converter: Degrees, Radians, Gradians, DMS & Turns

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Degrees to radians: rad = deg × π / 180 Radians to degrees: deg = rad × 180 / π Degrees to gradians: grad = deg × 10 / 9 Gradians to degrees: deg = grad × 0.9 Degrees to turns: turn = deg / 360 DMS to decimal degrees: deg = D + M/60 + S/3600

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
